analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/13/0x693e3857aa48bb2902fd12f724dc095622e61afc.sol:
	Contract DopeToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/13/0x693e3857aa48bb2902fd12f724dc095622e61afc.sol#221)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/13/0x693e3857aa48bb2902fd12f724dc095622e61afc.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/13/0x693e3857aa48bb2902fd12f724dc095622e61afc.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/13/0x693e3857aa48bb2902fd12f724dc095622e61afc.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
